thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoilers: Bethany Platt gets engaged to abuser Nathan as he lures her into a sex ring

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Coronation Street spoilers: Bethany Platt gets engaged to abuser Nathan as he lures her into a sex ring
text:
(Picture: ITV) Bethany Platt is to fall even deeper into sinister Nathan’s trap in Coronation Street as the vulnerable and groomed teenager is about to get engaged to the older man who is secretly planning to exploit her as part of a sex ring. 
The dramatic development comes as Bethany continues to be lured into Nathan’s murky world. Feeling grown up and excited to be with her older ‘boyfriend’, Bethany has placed both her trust and her heart in Nathan’s hands and is about to have her world upside down.
As part of an important, long running story at Coronation Street, viewers will become increasingly aware of the danger Bethany is in as scenes will eventually see Nathan attempt to offer her to his depraved friends.

And the despicable character has well and truly worked his way under Bethany’s skin when she agrees to marry him.
Reports suggest that Nathan will buy Bethany a ring when she starts to become unsure of his intentions and he will manipulate it to look like he deeply cares for her. But meanwhile, he is laying the foundations for a devastating turn of events that will reportedly see him pressure Bethany into sleeping with his friend Neil.
(Picture: ITV) And it looks set to be just the beginning of Nathan’s cruel exploitation of the youngster – can anyone save her as things get even worse?
